tool_description:
Easily create interactive SMS applications anywhere in the world.  At the core of TextIt lies our exclusive Flow engine. With Flows, anybody can set up or modify a complex SMS application without the need of a programmer or expensive consulting company.
Using a basic Android phone, you can launch your application instantly in any country while avoiding expensive set-up costs or external technical support.
name: TextIt
title: TextIt

api_list.name: Calls
api_list.description: Returns the incoming and outgoing calls for your organization, most recent first.

optional_parameters.name: relayer
optional_parameters.description: which relayer received or placed this call (int) (filterable: relayer)

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: the phone number of the caller or callee depending on the call_type (string) (filterable: phone)

optional_parameters.name: created_on
optional_parameters.description: when the call was received or sent (datetime) (filterable: before and after)

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description: the duration of the call in seconds (int, 0 for missed calls)

optional_parameters.name: call_type
optional_parameters.description: one of the following strings: (filterable: call_type) mt_call - Outgoing Call  mo_call - Incoming Call  mo_miss - Missed Incoming Call

api_list.name: Listing SMS Messages
api_list.description: Returns the SMS activity for your organization, listing the most recent messages first.

optional_parameters.name: relayer
optional_parameters.description: the id of the Android relayer that sent or received this message (int) (filterable: relayer)

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: the phone number of the sender or receiver, depending on direction (string) (filterable: phone)

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: the direction of the SMS, either I for incoming messages or O for outgoing (string) (filterable: direction)

optional_parameters.name: text
optional_parameters.description: the text of the message received, not this is the logical view, this message may have been received as multiple text messages (string)

optional_parameters.name: created_on
optional_parameters.description: the datetime when this sms was either received by the relayer or created by TextIt (datetime) (filterable: before and after)

optional_parameters.name: sent_on
optional_parameters.description: for outgoing messages, the datetime when the relayer sent the message (null if not yet sent or an incoming message) (datetime)

optional_parameters.name: delivered_on
optional_parameters.description: for outgoing messages, the datetime when the relayer delivered the message (null if not yet sent or an incoming message) (datetime)

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: the status of this message, a string one of: (filterable: status) Q - Message is queued awaiting to be sent S - Message has been sent by the relayer D - Message was delivered to the recipient H - Incoming message was handled by TextIt F - Message was not sent due to a failure

api_list.name: List Relayers
api_list.description: A GET returns the list of Android relayers for your organization, in the order of last activity date. Note that all status information for the device is as of the last time it was seen and can be null before the first sync.

optional_parameters.name: relayer
optional_parameters.description: the id of the the relayer (long)

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: the phone number for the relayer (string) (filterable: phone)

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: the name of this relayer (string)

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: which country the sim card for this relayer is registered for (string, two letter country code) (filterable: country)

optional_parameters.name: last_seen
optional_parameters.description: the datetime when this relayer was last seen by TextIt (datetime) (filterable: before and after)

optional_parameters.name: power_level
optional_parameters.description: the power level of the device (int)

optional_parameters.name: power_status
optional_parameters.description: the power status, either STATUS_DISCHARGING or STATUS_CHARGING (string)

optional_parameters.name: power_source
optional_parameters.description: the source of power as reported by Android (string)

optional_parameters.name: network_type
optional_parameters.description: the type of network the device is connected to as reported by Android (string)

optional_parameters.name: pending_message_count
optional_parameters.description: how many messages are assigned to this relayer but not yet sent (int)
